name: socket-retry-connect
description: Attempt to connect to socket multiple times
readme:
# Socket retry connect

Tiny helper lib that will retry connecting to tcp sockets.

See index.js & test.js for examples.

```js
var waitForSocket = require('wait-for-socket').waitForSocket;

waitForSocket({ port: 2828 }, function(err, socket) {
  // yey!
});

```
